item.description:
Psychic Fair
Sat. March 29, 2008
12:00-5:00

I will be there between 12 and 2. I may stay until 2:30. I'll have lunch there also, if anyone would like me to change the time email me.

Liz, I'll see you there, Walter it will be nice seeing you again and I'm hoping some others will join us.

Readings by

Gary - Intuitive Readings & Channels

John - Tarot, Zen Tarot & Celtic Runes

Rachael - Angel Readings & Pet Channeling

Debbie - Reads Playing Cards

Mary -

$20.00 per 15 minutes per reading



Luncheon Menu Available
item.why: Carousel Gardens is a beautiful mansion with a haunted history. They have fantastic food. Our group went here before and had a great time.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group
